channel.title: Fashion – Jewelry by Jonathan Silva
channel.description: Portfolio of CAD/CAM Designer Jonathan Silva

item.title: Smoky Quartz Monolith Necklace
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Smoky Quartz Monolith Necklace

Intenebris

This piece required a lot of research, prototyping, and searching for a very competent lapidary. I was buying huge crystals of Smoky Himalayan Quartz, and had little room for error. After several months of tests, I ended with this 7-piece setting and custom cut spike. I also took the product photography, and the matte black background you see here.

Software: Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix  
Client: Intenebris

item.title: Floating Octahedron Ring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Floating Octahedron Ring

Intenebris

This is a silver ring set with a pentagonal dipyramid (mirrored 4 sided pyramid) of custom cut quartz, or amethyst. It is for my brand Intenebris, which I used as an outlet to express my love for a dark as well as ultra-modern aesthetic. I also took these photos and videos.

Software: Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix
Client: Intenebris

item.title: Amethyst Geode Ring
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Deprecated: str_replace(): Passing null to parameter #3 ($subject) of type array|string is deprecated in /home/jonathansilva/public_html/jewelrybyjs/wp-includes/formatting.php on line 3993
item.content:encoded:
Amethyst Geode Ring

Intenebris

This was my first ring I ever designed for my brand back in 2012. I got it to work on the first iteration, and refined it to what it is today by the second version. It’s set with a cross section of Uruguayan Amethyst. Carefully hand cut. I had the vision for this, and knew right away that Amethyst in Uruguay would be perfect, because of it’s small crystal size and deep color relative to other amethyst. I wore one myself for many years.

Software: Rhinoceros 3D, Matrix
Client: Intenebris
